mapper.sql: id, shop_detail_id, brand_id, state, create_time, eat_time, pass_number_time, person_number,phone,wait_number,table_type,call_number,flow_money
mapper.insert: insert into tb_get_number (id, shop_detail_id, brand_id, state, create_time, eat_time, pass_number_time, person_number,phone,wait_number,table_type,call_number,flow_money) values (#{id},#{shopDetailId},#{brandId},#{state},#{createTime},#{eatTime},#{passNumberTime},#{personNumber},#{phone},#{waitNumber},#{tableType},#{callNumber},#{flowMoney})
mapper.select: SELECT FROM tb_get_number WHERE table_type = #{tableType} and shop_detail_id = #{shopId}
